article_title: Medtronic -- Benefiting From Emerging Market Growth, Aging Population

article_metadata.description: Assuming MDT can achieve its 15% growth target in emerging markets, these shares can reach $95 to $110 in the next two to three years, delivering upwards of 40% gains.
article_metadata.author: Richard Saintvilus
